# directio64.sys ![:inline](/images/twitter_verified.png) 

### Description

Confirmed vulnerable driver from Microsoft Block List
- **UUID**: a254e684-f6eb-40c4-a50a-7b76feb6cc02
- **Created**: 2023-07-22
- **Author**: Michael Haag
- **Acknowledgement**:  | [](https://twitter.com/)

{{< button "https://github.com/magicsword-io/LOLDrivers/raw/main/drivers/afbb28a756e233d32e224a664763f79c.bin" "Download" >}}{{< button "https://www.magicsword.io/premium" "Block" "red" >}}
{{< tip "warning" >}}

{{< /tip >}}



| Use Case | Privileges | Operating System | 
|:---- | ---- | ---- |
| Elevate privileges | kernel | Windows |
